description: Main application component for a React-based Tic Tac Toe game. Manages game state, user interactions, UI rendering, and includes hooks and logic integration for gameplay, move history, undo, reset, and accessibility features.

methods.name: useGame
methods.description: Custom hook managing game state, move handling, reset, undo, and logging actions.

methods.name: StatusBar
methods.description: Component displaying game status such as current player, winner, draw, and move count.

methods.name: Controls
methods.description: Component rendering game control buttons: New Game, Undo, Toggle History.

methods.name: HistoryList
methods.description: Component displaying the move history list when toggled.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component of the application, orchestrating overall UI, state, event handling, and accessible focus management.
